q: Michael Vick tells NFL commissioner Roger Goodell he's not hosting Super Bowl party Michael Vick has told NFL commissioner Roger Goodell that he will not be hosting a Super Bowl XLV party. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
